title: Psx1 Emulator, FFRoms 1-9, FFTactics, Crono Trigger roms
description:
For all those PLAYSTATION 1 LOVERS AND FINAL FANTASY LOVERS!!!


***ENJOY your Classic Final Fantasy Games 1 thru 9 without the troubles!!! All in One consolidated and working manner.

***THIS TORRENT INCLUDES :: A Fully working (with Graphics Plugins)PSX1 EMULATOR, with Final Fantasy 1 through 9 Roms-Games, with Final Fantasy Tactics Rom, and Crono Trigger Rom. 

This PSX1 Emulator HAS the BIOS file included, the Graphics Plugins included, even a few memory cards already, with some Final Fantasy Tactics saved games if interested, lol. 



***IMPORTANT NOTE :: These are ALL PSX1 EMULATOR stuffs. No PS2 GAMES SUCH AS FFX, FFX-2, FFXI,etc. -- THESE PS2 GAMES-ROMS ARE NOT INCLUDED -- (as seen in the logo picture) !!!! Was just the best logo picture I could find for this, lol.



*** No need to INSTALL anything.. just: 

1. LAUNCH the 'ePSXe' Emulator Program in the 'epsx folder'.
2. FILE
3. RUN ISO
4. POINT IT (with Browse function) TO the folder with the Roms-Games ('Final Fantasy Roms-Games Folder' OR the 'Roms-Other Games Folder' that is Included).
5. PICK YOUR GAME OF CHOICE, PLAY and Enjoy!!


IF you want, you can mess with the EPSXE program for keyboard/controller input, or video, or sound, etc. KNOCK YERSELF OUT :P lol. This WILL WORK on older computers with little to no issues. Enjoy!



Any Questions or comments please POST. Thank You ALL !! GG www.ThePirateBay.se

~ Texasrowley (Nolan) :)
